title: Leatherface

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Serve a fellow REF chili. 0 Charges.
- Put on a new face. 0 Charges.
- Prepare a feast (rampage at any player's house, including your own). 3 charges.

Attributes
- Can spawn in any REF slot
- For every kill you get, you will get another bowl of chili and a new face
- You will always clean your kills, and learn the roles of all of them.
- Putting on a new face will make you appear as that role for the night to all investigations that are fooled by fames.
- Serving chili to another REF will grant them Powerful defense for the night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Keep your family safe at all costs.

desc:
Post 5277
*"A grown man, huge, but mentally stunted. With emotions of an eight-year-old. Frankly, he scared the shit out of me." -Barry Farnsworth*
